title: Framingham Score Heart Age
description:
Cardio FastCalc is a cardiovascular risk calculator based on the Framingham Cohort Study, which is still ongoing and is the longest study of its kind. The study began in 1948 and is now following the fourth generation of participants.

This app will perform complex calculations based on the data you enter (age, sex, smoking status, diabetes, hypertension treatment, total cholesterol, HDL cholesterol and systolic blood pressure) and provide you with the result. In addition, the app includes the Friedewald formula for calculating LDL cholesterol.

The result consists of a percentage risk of developing cardiovascular disease in the next 10 years and an estimated heart age.

By cardiovascular disease, we mean stroke, heart attack, peripheral arterial disease or heart failure.

Go ahead and fill in the required data. Save this result, share it with friends and use it as a guide for your lifestyle changes.

Warning: Remember to always consult a doctor in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

summary: Know your heart age and your cardio risk super fast!
